gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Meteorological Data from the Russian Arctic, 1961-2000

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: National Snow and Ice Data Center
National Snow and Ice Data Center
National Snow and Ice Data Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains monthly means of meteorological observation data from Russian stations from 1961-2000 (for most stations). The Russian station observations were provided by Vladimir Radionov, Arctic and Antarctic Research Institute (AARI), St. Petersburg, and include 2-meter air temperature, sea level pressure, total and low cloud amount, precipitation, and relative humidity. Data are available in ASCII text format via FTP.
